snippet: The police on Thursday arrested 11 people accused of fighting alongside Islamist militants in Syria and Iraq or recruiting and raising money for such groups.
abstract: Police in Bosnia arrest 11 people accused of fighting alongside Islamist militants in Syria and Iraq or recruiting and raising money for such groups.
lead_paragraph: The police on Thursday arrested 11 people accused of fighting alongside Islamist militants in Syria and Iraq or recruiting and raising money for such groups.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
